creator: Sugar Games
descriptionHtml:
Blood of Titans is a free collectible card game (CCG) with a non-linear fantasy storyline, PVP and PVE battles, clans, tournaments, unique cards and deck builds and also thrilling quests. A horde of magical creatures and an army of humans will clash in an epic battle against the Order of the Burning Hand. Are you ready for the decisive battle?

Previously, this world was ruled by the Titans. Only True Magicians, in whom their blood flows, and you are one of them, can touch their power. It's time to reveal your gift and take the path of power and glory!

Collect and develop a unique deck of magic cards - exciting quests and breathtaking battles of the fantasy World await you. Join the battle to defend and develop your lands, sending the best warriors to the battlefield: hordes of undead or squads of mercenaries, evil demons or winged beasts. Become the master of 5 elements, and even dragons will obey you!

Features of the World of Blood of the Titans:
⚔ FORM THE DECK WISELY: more than 200 beautiful cards, each of them have unique abilities. Develop and improve the effectiveness of your decks!
⚔ SHARPEN YOUR MAGIC SKILL: send powerful cards reinforced with amulets into battle and become an active participant in the battle - your magic can change the course of the battle!
⚔ REVEAL ALL THE SECRETS OF POWERFUL TITANS: non-linear fantasy storyline of CCG, dozens of campaigns, thousands of quests including PVE battles. Over 50 characters - which one can you trust?
⚔ JOIN EXCITING PVP BATTLES: Mage tournaments, blitz tournaments, secret catacombs, leagues, and faction battles await you. The winner takes it all!
⚔ JOIN A CLAN OR CREATE YOUR OWN: team up with your comrades to exchange experience, develop a clan castle, exchange resources and participate in CLAN WARS!
⚔ JOIN RAIDS: go to a dark dungeon that takes you deep into the heart of this world, you will find the most dangerous opponents and unique rewards. How far can you go?
⚔ BE A WISE MASTER: buildings in the castle not only bring and store resources, but also allow you to enhance the power of collection of your cards. Build, develop and defend your castle.
⚔ PLAY THE GAME EVERY DAY: Get valuable resources and even rare cards for completing achievements, daily tasks and participating in blitz tournaments. Treasures, reward chests are waiting for you!
⚔ DEVELOP A STRATEGY LEADING TO VICTORY: use the right cards with the right abilities at the right time, enlarge the collection of your cards. Crush hordes of enemies on your way!
Do you have the courage and determination to challenge the world of the Blood of the Titans, full of magic and secrets?

Become a member of a new exciting new CCG, fight and become a winner! This game is worth your attention.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- It is now possible to buy a spell during the battle, at the moment of upgrading the Magic Sphere.
- Players can exchange amulets of different types.
- The ability of the Little Annie card is changed. Titans are immune to the Made-Up Rules ability.
- The gradation of Clan Leagues rewards is changed. The higher the league, the better the chance of finding cards in a chest.
- The prices for elemental stones, tokens and amulets, the instant upgrade of card level and rank are lowered.

title: Blood of Titans: Card Battles

creator: Sugar Games
descriptionHtml:
Do you have the courage and determination to challenge the Blood of Titans world? Only true Mages with Titan blood in their veins can touch the ultimate power. You are one of them. Collect and develop a unique deck of magic cards, fight battles to defend and develop your realm, send the best warriors to the battlefield. Become the master of 5 elements, and even dragons will obey you!

Features of the World of Blood of the Titans:

⚔ FORM THE DECK WISELY
More than 200 beautiful cards, each of them have unique abilities. Develop and improve the effectiveness of your decks!

⚔ SHARPEN YOUR MAGIC SKILL
Send powerful cards reinforced with amulets into battle and become an active participant in the battle - your magic can change the course of the battle!

⚔ REVEAL ALL THE SECRETS OF POWERFUL TITANS
Non-linear fantasy storyline of CCG, dozens of campaigns, thousands of quests including PVE battles. Over 50 characters - which one can you trust?

⚔ JOIN EXCITING PVP BATTLES
Mage tournaments, blitz tournaments, secret catacombs, leagues, and faction battles await you. The winner takes it all!

⚔ JOIN A CLAN OR CREATE YOUR OWN
Team up with your comrades to exchange experience, develop a clan castle, exchange resources and participate in CLAN WARS!

⚔ JOIN RAIDS
Go to a dark dungeon that takes you deep into the heart of this world, you will find the most dangerous opponents and unique rewards. How far can you go?

⚔ BE A WISE MASTER
Buildings in the castle not only bring and store resources, but also allow you to enhance the power of collection of your cards. Build, develop and defend your castle.

⚔ PLAY THE GAME EVERY DAY
Get valuable resources and even rare cards for completing achievements, daily tasks and participating in blitz tournaments. Treasures, reward chests are waiting for you!

⚔ DEVELOP A STRATEGY LEADING TO VICTORY
Use the right cards with the right abilities at the right time, enlarge the collection of your cards. Crush hordes of enemies on your way!

Become a member of a new exciting new CCG, fight and become a winner! This game is worth your attention.
descriptionShort: A card game with a non-linear storyline and exciting PVP and PVE battles.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. New card animations: «Imp», «Undersea Priestess», «Vampire Aristocrat», «Insane Mana Thief», «Fallen Angel».
2. The ability error of the Lamia card is fixed. Lamia resurrects with the health amount that is equal to the percentage of her ability.
3. The display error of the Day of Creatures icon is fixed.
4. The ability error of the Lava Golem card is fixed.
-The Lava Clumps ability stacks and deals increased damage.

More than 200 beautiful cards, each of them have unique abilities. Develop and improve the effectiveness of your decks!

⚔ SHARPEN YOUR MAGIC SKILL
Send powerful cards reinforced with amulets into battle and become an active participant in the battle - your magic can change the course of the battle!

⚔ REVEAL ALL THE SECRETS OF POWERFUL TITANS
Non-linear fantasy storyline of CCG, dozens of campaigns, thousands of quests including PVE battles. Over 50 characters - which one can you trust?

⚔ JOIN EXCITING PVP BATTLES
Mage tournaments, blitz tournaments, secret catacombs, leagues, and faction battles await you. The winner takes it all!

⚔ JOIN A CLAN OR CREATE YOUR OWN
Team up with your comrades to exchange experience, develop a clan castle, exchange resources and participate in CLAN WARS!

⚔ JOIN RAIDS
Go to a dark dungeon that takes you deep into the heart of this world, you will find the most dangerous opponents and unique rewards. How far can you go?

⚔ BE A WISE MASTER
Buildings in the castle not only bring and store resources, but also allow you to enhance the power of collection of your cards. Build, develop and defend your castle.

⚔ PLAY THE GAME EVERY DAY
Get valuable resources and even rare cards for completing achievements, daily tasks and participating in blitz tournaments. Treasures, reward chests are waiting for you!

⚔ DEVELOP A STRATEGY LEADING TO VICTORY
Use the right cards with the right abilities at the right time, enlarge the collection of your cards. Crush hordes of enemies on your way!

Become a member of a new exciting new CCG, fight and become a winner! This game is worth your attention.
descriptionShort: A card game with a non-linear storyline and exciting PVP and PVE battles.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. We have changed the number of candidate tickets that can be purchased at one time from 1 to 3, price saved 0.99 USD.
2. Reduced price in the promotion "Stack of tickets".
3. Added additional "Attack" and "Defense" tabs to the attack log. Players will be able to track all their PVP matches.
4. Added the option to delete an account in the game settings.
5. Cards that pass the expedition in the catacombs can be used in the game mode "Blitz – Tournament".

title: Blood of Titans: Card Battles

creator: Sugar Games, TOO
descriptionHtml:
A fantasy CCG game.
Do you have the courage and determination to challenge the Blood of Titans world? Collect and develop a unique deck of magic cards, fight battles to defend and develop your lands, send the best warriors to the battlefield. Become the master of 5 elements, and even dragons will obey you!

The Blood of Titans world features:

⚔ 300+ cards with unique abilities
Collect the strongest deck and find your way to victory!

⚔ Nonlinear fantasy plot
2000+ text quests, unexpected opponents, PVE battles and boss fights — solve all the puzzles of the magic world!

⚔ Fight other players
Develop your game strategy to win PVP battles. Attack enemy cities, participate in tournaments of mages and join faction wars!

⚔ Clan Wars
Join a clan: chat with other members, exchange your experience, share resources with your brothers in arms and develop the clan castle. Make your contribution to the victory in Clan Wars!

⚔ New activities every day
Raids and Catacombs, holiday quests and blitz tournaments, trials and battle passes — choose your game mode or take part in all of them. It’s up to you to decide!

Become a member of a new captivating CCG, fight and become the winner!
descriptionShort: A card game with a non-linear storyline and exciting PVP and PVE battles.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. Major changes have been made to player development:
- The maximum player level has increased to Level 80.
- The maximum card level has increased to Level 80.
- The number of amulet levels has increased to 16.
- The following buildings now have extra levels: defence and attack buildings, Gold Mines, Mana Well, Elemental Crystals, Citadel, Laboratory.
2. The system of premium battle passes in the Great Trial game mode has been updated.

Do you have the courage and determination to challenge the Blood of Titans world? Collect and develop a unique deck of magic cards, fight battles to defend and develop your lands, send the best warriors to the battlefield. Become the master of 5 elements, and even dragons will obey you!

The Blood of Titans world features:

⚔ 300+ cards with unique abilities
Collect the strongest deck and find your way to victory!

⚔ Nonlinear fantasy plot
2000+ text quests, unexpected opponents, PVE battles and boss fights — solve all the puzzles of the magic world!

⚔ Fight other players
Develop your game strategy to win PVP battles. Attack enemy cities, participate in tournaments of mages and join faction wars!

⚔ Clan Wars
Join a clan: chat with other members, exchange your experience, share resources with your brothers in arms and develop the clan castle. Make your contribution to the victory in Clan Wars!

⚔ New activities every day
Raids and Catacombs, holiday quests and blitz tournaments, trials and battle passes — choose your game mode or take part in all of them. It’s up to you to decide!

Become a member of a new captivating CCG, fight and become the winner!
descriptionShort: A card game with a non-linear storyline and exciting PVP and PVE battles.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

3. The duel window now provides information about creature days and element days.
4. Several cards have new skin animations.

title: Blood of Titans: Card Battles

creator: Sugar Games, TOO
descriptionHtml:
Are you ready to enter the enchanting realm of the Blood of Titans and prove your mettle? Gather an unbeatable deck of magical cards, defend your land, and send your most powerful warriors to battle. Master the five elements and even dragons will bow down to your command!

In the Blood of Titans, you'll encounter:

⚔ Over 300 cards with unique abilities
Strategize and assemble the ultimate deck to emerge victorious!

⚔ A nonlinear fantasy storyline
Embark on over 2000 quests, face unexpected foes, engage in PVE battles, and defeat mighty bosses to unravel the secrets of this mystical world.

⚔ PVP battles against other players
Develop your game plan and engage in intense battles to overtake enemy cities, compete in mage tournaments, and join faction wars!

⚔ Join a Clan and participate in Clan Wars
Join forces with fellow players, share resources, and work together to develop your clan castle. Take on other clans and make your mark in Clan Wars!

⚔ New daily activities to keep you engaged
Discover new challenges every day such as raids, catacombs, holiday quests, blitz tournaments, trials, and battle passes. The choice is yours!

Become a part of this captivating CCG world and fight your way to the top. Join the Blood of Titans now and become the ultimate champion!
descriptionShort: A card game with a non-linear storyline and exciting PVP and PVE battles.

title:
Blood of Titans: Card Battles
1.68

creator: Sugar Games, TOO
descriptionHtml:
Blood of Titans: Card Battle is a fantasy RPG and strategy game for those who enjoy testing their deck building skills in immersive card collecting games (CCG)!

Experience the thrill of battle card games where strategy is the key to victory. Plan your moves wisely, summon creatures from myths, cast powerful spells, and outwit your enemies to emerge victorious.
